projects.name: Call center manager
projects.content: Developed features for creating tests, tutorials, SOPs, and notifications, which could potentially increase admin efficiency by up to 30%.             Streamlined access to notifications,  utorials, and profile updates for employees, potentially boosting engagement and performance by 25%.

work: Spearheaded the development of a multi-language translation system using Django, boosting translation efficiency for books and PDFs by 35% andexpanding accessibility to over 10,000 users.
Innovated advanced translation features  Bank of Baroda website, accelerating document processing time by 25%.
Enhanced the udaanproject.org post-editing tool,resulting in a 20% improvement in user experience ratings through targeted optimizations.

During my internship, I leveraged FastAPI with asynchronous Python to develop high-performance APIs. This approach provided a significant speed and efficiency boost compared to the traditional synchronous request handling in Django. Additionally, I implemented Swagger APIs to enhance documentation and testing capabilities.
Developed and maintained dynamic websites using Django, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and Python,resulting in a 30% boost in site performance and user engagement.
Created and deployed user-centric interfaces and Django applications, including a rider app that improved order management efficiency by 20%.
Designed and integrated Django applications with REST APIs, such as Shopify, enhancing functionality and improving user experience by 25%.
Implemented the CCAvenue payment gateway in Django applications, optimizing walletrecharge processes and reducing transaction times by 40%.
Advanced backend development by optimizing performance and reliability of applications by 15% through strategic Django solutions.
